search.query: | inputlookup windows_perfmon_system | dedup Host | sort Host
| inputlookup windows_perfmon_details | search object="Processor" | dedup instance | table instance | sort instance
| inputlookup windows_perfmon_details | search object="Processor" | dedup counter | table counter | sort counter

eventtype="perfmon_windows" $PerfmonHost$ Host="$PerfmonHostWildcard$" object="Processor" counter="$CPUCounter$" instance="$CPUInstance$" | stats sparkline(avg(Value)) as Trend avg(Value) as Average, max(Value) as Peak, latest(Value) as Current, latest(_time) as "Last Updated" by Host | convert ctime("Last Updated") | sort - Current | eval Average=round(Average, 2) | eval Peak=round(Peak, 2) | eval Current=round(Current, 2)
